name: Billion$taire
description:
It's simple.  You climb the stairs to become the richest person alive

This game is intended to help you fathom how much a billion dollars really is... and how much 125 billion dollars is.  

Earn $100,000 with each step.  That's as much as the average American makes in 2 years. Surely it won't take too LONG to get to the top...

This game is for fun and educational purposes ONLY, and is in no way affiliated with Bernie Sanders, Democratic Socialist of America, or anyone besides the creator of this game.  All characters are fictional, and the writing, artwork, and music is completely original.
